page.title: 18Houses Upton Magna,Uffington
page.content: There are no housing estates in Uffington and Upton Magna.There are no new houses in Uffington,but the newest houses in Upton Magna are Frank Crosse Drive and the houses opposite Frank Crosse Drive.There are black and white houses in both villages.In Uffington the old post office has been renovated and Five and Six,Upton Magna and Walnut Cottage have also been renovated. Upton Magna is defined as a conservation area.In Uffington there are no Council Houses but in Upton Magna there are some along Pelham Road.There are a variety of materials used for rooves in the area. These are thatched (covered with corregated iron when decaying) slate and tiles.
